content: > this pattern is available for ** free > on my blog here 1 ** the > downloadable pdf listed for sale > contains the full pattern including > important notes stitch guide written > instructions and photo-tutorial in > one printable file without > advertisements **paid pdf contains two > bonus charts ** living lagom shawl is about living a happy and balanced life the shawl is slightly assymetrical with chunky cables combined with lace parts **level ** intermediate **size ** approx 70 x 155cm 27 5 x 61 **materials ** ~ five skeins of namaste yarn by scheepjes in colour 614 warrior ~ 7mm us2 crochet hook ~ tapestry needle to weave in tails 1 https //www lillabjorncrochet com/2019/02/living-lagom-shawl-free-crochet-pattern html
